Because you deserve it, “The Reward.”

Gran Coramino Cristalino
1oz Grapefruit Juice
0.5oz Orange Liqueur
1 Rosemary Sprig
Ginger Beer to top
Collins Glas

In a cocktail shaker, add rosemary sprig, then muddle. Add Gran Coramino Cristalino, grapefruit juice, and orange liqueur. Add fresh ice, then shake and strain into Collins glass over fresh ice. Top with ginger beer and garnish with grapefruit peel and rosemary sprig.”
